Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are generally known to be one of the most promising energy conversion devices, offering benefits such as system compactness, high efficiency and low environmental pollution.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: In this study, La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) nanoceramic powders were prepared through the citrate-nitrate auto-combustion route with a beta-alanine-to-nitrate ratio of 1:1.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Thereafter, a Thermolyne 47900 furnace was used to calcine the prepared powders at 900 degrees C for 4 hrs to remove carbonaceous residues, and then, the prepared powders were characterized using SEM/EDS, XRD, and TGA.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Calculations using the Debye-Scherrer equation illustrated that the average crystallite size of the powders was approximately 20-25 nm.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: There was no loss in weight after reaching a temperature of similar to 700 degrees C, as indicated by TGA, signifying the completion of combustion.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Electrochemical characterization of the La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) cathode powders was performed by coating these powders (as the cathode functional layer (CFL) with 40-60 wt% 8YSZ on the bottom and the catalyst layer (CL) on the top) using the screen printing technique on SOFC half-cells (NiO-YSZ+ YSZ) obtained from CGCRI (Kolkata, India) with a cell size of 36 mm dia x 1.6 mm (effective electrode area of similar to 1.13 cm(2)).
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: These cells were tested with H-2 and O-2 at 750-800 degrees C with flow rates of 1.2-1.8 lit min(-1) H-2 and 0.4-0.6 lit min(-1) O-2 with a hydrogen humidification of 3%.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The current density (cd) and power density (pd) were the highest for the CFL containing 60 wt% LSM and 40 wt% YSZ.
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The cd and pd of the single SOFC cell were 0.8 A cm(-2) (at 0.7 V) and 0.6 W cm(-2), respectively, at 800 degrees C, a hydrogen flow rate of 1.8 lit min(-1) and an oxygen flow rate of 0.6 lit min(-1).
Titulo: Alanine Assisted Synthesis and Characterization of La0.65Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) Nanocrystalline Cathode Powders for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)
